original_text:
The kings of the earth did not believe,
    nor any of the inhabitants of the world,
that foe or enemy could enter
    the gates of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 대적과 원수가 예루살렘 성문으로 들어갈 줄은 세상의 모든 왕들과 천하 모든 백성이 믿지 못하였었도다

sentences.original_text: The kings of the earth did not believe
nor any of the inhabitants of the world
that foe or enemy could enter the gates of Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 원수나 대적이 예루살렘 성문에 들어올 수 있으리라.
